data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Babaeian, Esmaeil, Joharchi, Omid, Jamshidian, Maryam Keshavarz (2014): A new species of the genus Nothrholaspis Berlese (Acari: Macrochelidae) from Iran. Zootaxa 3784 (5): 585-590, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3784.5.7
